Posts.Content: Sep 1, 2015 09:34PM leftrightrepeat wrote: Love, love, love Celexa. Had to be taken off to due to allergic reaction (was so itchy on it). Switched to Effexor, did an OK job, my onc was worried about my increased heart rate, came off of effexor SLOWLY. Now I''m back at square one. I poo pooed all of the people who said it was hard to come off of effexor but it really is hard! I threw up, was shaking, etc. Wouldn't wish it on my own worst enemy. No clue why that happened. On to bigger and better things ahead.

With two small kids on top of that, I don't have time to worry!
